headline: 3 Top AI-Powered Biotech Stocks to Buy in February
summary: Artificial intelligence (AI) is transforming various industries as a major investing theme in 2025.  The technology's ability to automate complex workflows and enhance productivity is seen as a game-changer for the next generation of innovation.  Perhaps the most promising AI application is its potential to revolutionize medicine by accelerating the drug discovery process to deliver more effective therapies.

headline: Is Moderna Stock A Sell With Robert F. Kennedy Eyeing The Lead Role At HHS?
summary: Moderna stock tumbled after the Senate Finance Committee voted to send RFK Jr.'s nomination for the HHS secretary to the full chamber.
